scripts.commit-check: pnpm cyp-clean && pnpm biome-format && pnpm lint
scripts.cyp-component: pnpm cyp-clean &&  hcp vault-secrets run -- cypress open --component
scripts.cyp-e2e-headless: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm cypress run --e2e
scripts.cyp-e2e-headless-auth: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm cypress run --e2e --headless --spec 'cypress/e2e/auth/**/*.cy.ts'
scripts.cyp-open: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm cypress open
scripts.cyp-test-e2e: pnpm drizzle-test-generate && pnpm drizzle-test-migrate  && pnpm cyp-e2e-headless
scripts.drizzle-dev-generate: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm drizzle-kit generate --config=drizzle-dev.config.ts
scripts.drizzle-dev-migrate: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm drizzle-kit migrate --config=drizzle-dev.config.ts
scripts.drizzle-push-dev: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm drizzle-kit push --config=drizzle-dev.config.ts
scripts.drizzle-push-test: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm drizzle-kit push --config=drizzle-test.config.ts
scripts.drizzle-reset-dev-db: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm dlx tsx src/db/seeds/reset.ts
scripts.drizzle-reset-test-db: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm dlx tsx src/db/seeds/reset-test-db.ts
scripts.drizzle-seed: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm tsx src/db/seeds/seed.ts --config=drizzle-test.config.ts
scripts.drizzle-seed-dev-db: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm tsx src/db/seeds/best-seed-dev-db.ts --config=drizzle-dev.config.ts
scripts.drizzle-seed-test-db: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm tsx src/db/seeds/best-seed-test-db.ts --config=drizzle-test.config.ts
scripts.drizzle-test-generate: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm drizzle-kit generate --config=drizzle-test.config.ts
scripts.drizzle-test-migrate: hcp vault-secrets run -- pnpm drizzle-kit migrate --config=drizzle-test.config.ts
